title: Enforcement of the Prescription Drug Marketing Act

content.question: After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the foundation of the authority of the DEA to carry out the Prescription Drug Marketing Act and explain how the president could affect the powers of the DEA. Explain how congressional oversight of the DEA in this scenario reflects the principle of checks and balances. Describe what the Supreme Court could do if a case with a question about the Prescription Drug Marketing Act came before the Court. Explain how the actions of the Court could impact the ability of the DEA to carry out its efforts to eliminate drug trafficking and distribution.
